snippet.title: Batman: The Brave and the Bold the Videogame (Wii) Trailer
snippet.description: Nintendo Life - Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment releases a trailer for its video game adaptation of the animated series for the Wii and DS; developed by WayForward
